subject: [OpenAL] Game crash on missing sound file
description:
When OpenAL is selected, the game crashes without error when coming across a missing sound file. This does not happen with SDL2. Find the console log output below: 
13450 [skipnotify]^7kemon^7 entered the game
   13450 Connected to a pure server.
   13450 [skipnotify]^1FIGHT!
   14100 [skipnotify]noclip ON
   16650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   16650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   16650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   17750 [skipnotify]noclip OFF
   18650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   18650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   18650 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid operation
   21400 ^5The Tank has been repaired!
   21400 Can't read sound file sound/vo/dk/1_tankrep.wav
   21400 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid value
   21400 ----- Client Shutdown ----------
   21400 ^3WARNING S_AL_ClearError: unhandled AL error: Invalid value
   21400 RE_Shutdown( 1 )
   21400 SDL input devices shut down.
   21400 --------------------------------
   21400 ----- Server Shutdown ----------
   21400 ==== ShutdownGame (0 - dingenskirchen) ====
